entry.title: Minor editorial fixes to lightning-rfc
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj has sent an email with minor editorial patches for lighting-rfc. The email contains three attachments, two of which are patches (0001-02-peer-protocol.md-Minor-typo-update_htlc_add-verb-.patch and 0003-07-routing-gossip.md-channel_update-Update-text-abou.patch) while the third attachment (0002-07-routing-gossip.md-Move-some-text-about-ipv6-and-p.patch) is related to IPv6 and patch movement.
